meanings.definition: To defeat or surpass by using a higher trump card in a card game.
meanings.sent1: In the game, I can overtrump my opponent by playing the ace of spades.
meanings.sent2: She managed to overtrump her friend by playing the joker card at the right moment.
meanings.sent3: During the card game, I always overtrump my friends with my lucky deck.
meanings.sent4: Her strategic move to overtrump him was like playing the winning card in life.
meanings.sent5: The way he overtrumped his opponent made him the champion of the card table.

meanings.definition: To outdo or surpass someone or something in a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The team worked hard to overtrump their rivals in the final match.
meanings.sent2: She always tries to overtrump her own records in every competition.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see him overtrump his fear of heights during the challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to overtrump all obstacles was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The way he overtrumped his competitors showed his true strength and skill.
